skill_description.rpgmod.fireball:
Fireball
Light enemies ablaze with an exploding ball of flame
skill_description.rpgmod.blink:
Blink
Step through reality itself and teleport yourself to a target location
skill_description.rpgmod.blizzard:
Blizzard
Slow and damage foes with a raging storm of sleet and snow
skill_description.rpgmod.thunder:
Thunder
Call down a lightning strike after a short delay. Can be attached to a target or engraved into the ground
skill_description.rpgmod.envenom:
Envenom
Inject your foe with a deadly venom, slowly draining their life
skill_description.rpgmod.smoke_bomb:
Smoke Bomb
Vanish in a puff of smoke. Become fully invisible to both players and mobs
skill_description.rpgmod.rupture:
Rupture
Strike at the heels, causing enemies to take damage as they flee
skill_description.rpgmod.execute:
Execute
Finish off a wounded opponent with less than a third of their health
skill_description.rpgmod.berserk:
Berserk
Allow yourself to be consumed by rage. Gain movement speed and the ability to fight with two weapons, but take more damage
skill_description.rpgmod.stomp:
Stomp
Create a tremor that stuns nearby enemies. Activate midair to transfer fall damage from yourself to your foes
skill_description.rpgmod.grapple:
Grapple
Throw a hooked chain to pull your enemies within the range of your axe
skill_description.rpgmod.molten_shell:
Molten Shell
Call upon your draconic ancestry for protection. Burn and knock enemies back while regenerating health.
skill_description.rpgmod.blessed_blades:
Bless Blades
Cast a prayer on the weapons of nearby players, briefly granting them the ability to steal life with every hit
skill_description.rpgmod.holy_shield:
Holy Shield
Call upon a higher power for protection from the next three attacks
skill_description.rpgmod.smiting_ray:
Smiting Ray
Strike foes with a beam of light, causing them to take damage from healing for a short time
skill_description.rpgmod.healing_aura:
Heal Aura
Release steady waves of healing to mend the wounds of all nearby players
death.attack.venom.player: %1$s fell to the venomous blades of %2$s
death.attack.rupture: %1$s ran too fast and bled out
death.attack.rupture.player: %1$s bled to death from the precise strikes of %2$s
